channel.title: Daily News
channel.description: 毎日更新のニュースサマリー

item.description: Microsoft has hired more than twenty senior engineers and researchers away from Google DeepMind, including Amar Subramanya, former VP for Gemini Assistant. The recruiting drive is led by Mustafa Suley...

OpenAI introduced a general‑purpose “ChatGPT agent” that can navigate calendars, create slideshows, run code and use connectors like Gmail and GitHub. The agent combines earlier tools, including Opera...

xAI’s Grok app introduced new “companions”: an anime girl (Ani) with an 18+ mode and a red‑panda avatar (Rudy) whose “Bad Rudy” persona embraces violent fantasies. The release follows Grok’s recent an...

Nvidia confirmed it will re‑start sales of its H20 AI accelerator in China after the U.S. government softened an April export ban. The H20 is the most capable GPU Nvidia can legally ship to China; Ali...

Meta confirmed the acquisition of Play AI, a startup whose platform generates natural-sounding synthetic voices. An internal memo says the entire Play AI team will join Meta next week. Meta plans to a...
